snippet.title: PC Engine Longplay [086] Fushigi no Yume no Alice (JP) (Fan Translation)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: KAGE-008

Overview from MobyGames:
'Based on Lewis Carrol's Alice in Wonderland novels, Fushigi no Yume no Alice is a cute 2-D platformer which casts you as Alice, a blond-haired girl wearing a pink dress. Your job is to make your way through forests and caves, defeating enemies that you come across by either jumping on their heads or shouting 'IYA' at them. Some enemies will drop eggs which will explode. You can kick these eggs and use them to destroy the enemies themselves. There are three levels in each area, and each level ends with you defeating a boss.'

Also that stats can be upgraded as well by using the Red Book magic (wisely) to reveal upgrade items hidden within the levels. Other magic power choices are the Blue Book which makes Alice jump higher, the Green Book to generate an earthquake, the Silver Book to be temporarily invincible and lastly the Golden Book to summon a genie who will kill all enemies on the screen.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
